data.title: Felt like they were in a hurry to get rid of me
data.text: Really disappointed with this place. I had a $50 gift certificate so I was looking forward to a nice dinner on someone else. The waiter seemed like he was in a hurry to get rid of me. I ordered from their 3 course set menu and added an appetizer. The appetizer came quickly and before I had a chance to eat a bite of it my salad was also at the table. Within 3 minutes my filet was also at the table. It was overwhelming and not the relaxed dinning experience I was looking for. My filet was very fatty, I questioned if it was in fact filet mignon. I asked for a box for my leftovers and the waiter tried to bring me my dessert in a to-go box. I told him I wanted to eat it then and he seemed put off. He also asked me pretty snarkily if I wanted ANOTHER ice tea. Overall, if I was spending my money, I wouldn't come back. The Bang Bang Shrimp I had as an appetizer was good, the best thing I ate.

owner_response.author: BonefishGrill, Manager at Bonefish Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We feel terrible that your visit ended up this way. We'd like to review this further if you could please take a moment to send me an email at customerservice@bonefishgrill.com with the subject "TripAdvisor - Novi, MI". We can then correspond directly over email. 

Sincerely, 

Madeline
Bonefish Grill
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: MY STEAK! A1
data.text: This is one of my places I get my steak from yes! a filet mignon steak. Cooked to your likeness along with creamy potatoes an broccoli, thats  my side . Don't forget to ask for Warm Bread along with dipping olive oil ! Need a Appetizer!  get the " Bang Bang Shrimp" !!  Bonefish also have delicious pork chops served two ways.  Find your dish!!. Enjoy!

data.title: It was ok
data.text:
Bonefish had been on my list of places to try for a long time!

I reserved brunch for 10.  Only 3 showed up. The hostess was very patient with us and gave us time for the entire party to show. Given it was early on a Sunday, there were plenty of tables and since it was a beautiful day, we sat outside. Very nice!

They had a smaller menu for brunch. They had appetizers, salads, egg dishes, French toast, and seafood dishes. 

We started with an appetizer of the bang bang shrimp. The portion was generous, and the spice was the proper amount, but there was too much sauce. 

They have a full bar. My friends both had a mimosa. I had the non alcoholic blackberry smash, which was awesome. I've looked up the recipe so I can recreate it at home. 

My two friends both had eggs Benedict and enjoyed it. With egg dishes you can have either scalloped potatoes or asparagus. They each got one and enjoyed them!

I ended up on the California omelette. It was large with cheese, bacon, avocado and tomatoes. The tomatoes had an odd taste. It came with stale toast and my choice of the potatoes or asparagus. I chose the asparagus, which was good. The omelette was ok. Nothing great.  

The hostess was nice, but our waitress was very slow and cold. 

They have plenty of parking and it's close to a lot of shopping. 

Overall, I wasn't overly impressed. Based on brunch, I have no interest in coming back.

data.title: Dinner
data.text: Never had bad service or food here. Will continue to come back. They have a variety of selections, including brunch on Sunday and specials on Tuesday.

data.title: Great Place
data.text: Food is always prepared well, great service and good specials. Recommend a reservation. Bar gets crowded, but the outside seating is great. Parking is tough due to all the other merchants, but well worth the short walk. It's always busy which speaks volumes.

data.title: Good food, ate here twice in one week
data.text: Traveling on business for a tradeshow and I had the Blackened Baja Fish Tacos and they were awesome. The second night I had the Bang Bang Shrimp Tacos and they were just as awesome. Wanted to go a third night because the food and service was just good and they had a nice menu, never been to their restaurant but I am now hooked.

data.title: Awesome!
data.text: Just popped in on Friday evening, 45 minute wait for a table so we sat at the bar. The bartender, drinks, and food were all awesome. The bartender was friendly, attentive, but not overbearing. Drinks were perfect, good wine recommendations. We had the corn & crab chowder which was great! We both had the blackened fish tacos which were superb, we selected the side of greens with balsamic vinaigrette also great! Also really enjoyed the complimentary warm bread served with olive oil and pesto. A thoroughly delightful meal, will definitely return, no complaints.

data.title: Expensive but good
data.text: Been to many Bonefish restaurants and this one is consistent with the rest. But all are somewhat overpriced, in my view, for very a competent but not truly spectacular meal.

data.title: Good grilled fish at a reasonable price
data.text: One of the few options to eat good fish in the area at a reasonable price, I would say the only one. There are other but the taste is not as good as this one. Try the Bloody Mary's, they are great. An appetizer you shouldn't miss is the seared ahi tuna with soja sauce. I love the chilean sea bass but from time to time they have some specials which worth a try.

data.title: Average Food, Prices high for the portions received
data.text: I have been here a few times.  The food is good, but the portions are small for what you pay for.  The bang bang shrimp aptz is a favorite here.  I ordered scallops and shrimp for $18 and the 2 sides were very small and there were 4 small scallops & 6 small shrimps.  I think I could have gotten more at Red Lobster. My friend ordered Ahi Tuna and thought the portion was small.  She said Bar None has bigger tuna for less cost and taste the same.  The atmosphere here is nice.  It's dimly lit and feels romantic.  I just thought the portions were too small for what I got.  Drinks are $8-12 here.

data.title: Outstanding food and service
data.text: Amazing appetizers can sometimes fill you up before your meal arrives...NICE problem to have!  Love the seared tuna and the chowder. salads are great and a variety of specials always calls to me. Love this place. Worth the wait!!

data.title: Amazing Salmon!
data.text: I had the salmon with the buttery citrus sauce (forgot the name). The waitress offered a topping made by the chef which included scallops and spinach. It's not listed on the menu but all I can say is, it was amazing! The best salmon I have ever had. Crispy edges but still tender and moist.

data.title: Nice But Changing
data.text: This has been one of my favorite places to dine, especially on Wednesdays since the Bang Bang Shrimp are on special that day.  But about a year ago, they decided to change the way they do the shrimp and made them crunchier and smaller.  This did not make it taste better.  I have been waiting for them to realize they made a mistake, but it hasn't happened yet.  Otherwise, this is a nice restaurant for casual or formal dining with friends or family.  The 'Mango Sidecar' cocktail is delicious if the bartender doesn't water it down too much, as they sometimes do.  My experiences have been good with the service and meals, and I would recommend Bonefish to my friends.

data.title: It's been better
data.text:
Bonefish is one of my favorite chains that was consistently excellent no matter the location.  Something has happened to the Novi restaurant though.  We were brought to a table that was in the middle of the restaurant. Since it was half empty, I requested a booth so we wouldn't be on display.  They would only place us at the booth by the kitchen, though there were others available.  I ordered my drink, which was great, and then our dinners.  After waiting for a long while our waitress asks if we want bread.  Call me crazy, but isn't that a given?   Especially at Bonefish?   I had the twin lobster tails with spinach and sweet potatoes.  It was good but the consistency of the mashed sweet potatoes was odd.  They were thin as if too much liquid was mixed in. My husband got the surf and turf.  The steak looked terrible like it was cooked at too high heat, dry, and just blah.  We've had plenty of steaks at other Bonefish Grill locations and it's always superb.  Not sure what happened here.  Ordered dessert and the coconut pie was yummy while the key lime pie was not.  My husband ordered ordered an Irish coffee and was given a shot of Bailey's and whiskey.  

Maybe this was a bad night and I know I'll go back to Bonefish at another location but most likely not in Novi.

data.title: Not as good as before!!!
data.text:
We dined at the Bonefish Grill on Aug 5th.   

I asked the waitress about their steaks.  She let us in a secret.  She said "The owners of the Flemings and the Bonefish Grill are the same.   The steaks are the same at both the restaurants, except it costs less here".

Based on this comment, I ordered filet mignon (Normally I would order sea food).  My wife ordered sea bass.

Our appetizer calamari arrived luke warm, although sufficient quantity.  The sea bass was good, but again not hot.  And my Filet was chewy.  Did not finish it.

Normally we had good luck with Bonefish Grill.

user_location.name: West Bloomfield Township, Michigan, United States

data.title: Anniversary Celebration
data.text:
We have been at this restaurant before & wanted to take my 90 year old Dad for our Anniversary dinner....unfortunately, he ordered the cod & chips, which was terrible.....there was very little fish & all breading! The other 2 meals were average...the bread & bang bang shrimp was the best...as we were leaving, the owner asked us how everything was & I stated our disappointment...he didn't seem too interested...
I am still rating this restaurant high because of our great experiences in the past! It would have been nice if SOMEONE there would have said Happy Anniversary! I had mentioned that when I made the reservation! Too many expectations on my part!

data.title: What happened to this place
data.text: Waited 20 minutes for a table even though there were at least 10 empty tables and no one waiting.  Waited at the bar for at least 5 minutes before the bartender bothered to end his conversation with the only other person at the bar.  That was the good part.  Ordered walleye and shrimp, they were both hammered, so over cooked.  My wife's steak was cooked perfectly medium rare.  It only took about 5 minutes or so to get napkins and utensils after the food came. Would have been nice to eat while the food was still hot.  Ordered the coconut pie for dessert, but the waiter chose to bring us the bill instead.  We could have complained, but decided to just write the place off for the future.

data.title: Not as good as expected
data.text: Tried to come here by myself on a business trip on a weeknight and they told me it would be a 30 minute wait even though I was a 1 person party.  Later came here with my business team and ordered the Ahi Tuna, which was poorly cooked and had a weird texture.

data.title: Disappointed - inferior service
data.text: Normally, food and service is significantly better than average. Tonight's dinner was less than that. We had reservations for 6:15 pm and the restaurant was not busy. Our waiter didn't arrive at our table for 15 minutes, even though he served two other tables that arrived after us. Our waiter spent so much time at the table next to us, we attempted to to get some attention multiple times. Example: we waited 15 more minutes to get "hot" bread while other tables were served with hot bread. Our meals came an hour after we sat down.  We were given the excuse multiple times that "someone called in." The fish, this evening's featured special, was excessively dry.  So dry, my first mouthful scratched my throat; potatoes were swimming in butter.  We will not sit in this waiter's area, again.  Thanks to the manager for listening to our feelings of being treated like second class citizens. We did feel that management cared.

data.title: Relaxing dinner to celebrate wedding anniversary
data.text: We chose Bonefish Grill because of a desire to have seafood, their excellent service, ambiance, and very good food quality and presentation.
